verses.verse: חֲז֖וֹן <S%H2377><s%> The vision עֹֽבַדְיָ֑ה <S%H5662><s%> of Obadiah כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַר֩ <S%H559><s%> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֨י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> from the LORD לֶאֱד֗וֹם <S%H123><s%> concerning Edom שְׁמוּעָ֨ה <S%H8052><s%> a rumour שָׁמַ֜עְנוּ <S%H8085><s%> We have heard מֵאֵ֤ת <S%H853><s%> יְהוָה֙ <S%H3069><s%> GOD וְצִיר֙ <S%H6735><s%> and an ambassador בַּגּוֹיִ֣ם <S%H1471><s%> among the heathen שֻׁלָּ֔ח <S%H7971><s%> is sent ק֛וּמוּ <S%H6965><s%> Arise וְנָק֥וּמָה <S%H6965><s%> ye and let us rise up עָלֶ֖יהָ <S%H5921><s%> against לַמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <S%H4421><s%> against her in battle

הִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold קָטֹ֛ן <S%H6996><s%> thee small נְתַתִּ֖יךָ <S%H5414><s%> Behold I have made בַּגּוֹיִ֑ם <S%H1471><s%> among the heathen בָּז֥וּי <S%H959><s%> despised אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> You מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> thou art greatly

זְד֤וֹן <S%H2087><s%> The pride לִבְּךָ֙ <S%H3820><s%> of thine heart הִשִּׁיאֶ֔ךָ <S%H5377><s%> hath deceived שֹׁכְנִ֥י <S%H7931><s%> thee thou that dwellest בְחַגְוֵי־ <S%H2288><s%> in the clefts סֶּ֖לַע <S%H5553><s%> of the rock מְר֣וֹם <S%H4791><s%> [is] high שִׁבְתּ֑וֹ <S%H7674><s%> cease אֹמֵ֣ר <S%H559><s%> that saith בְּלִבּ֔וֹ <S%H3820><s%> in his heart מִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> Who יוֹרִדֵ֖נִי <S%H3381><s%> Who shall bring me down אָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> common

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> Though תַּגְבִּ֣יהַּ <S%H1361><s%> Though thou exalt כַּנֶּ֔שֶׁר <S%H5404><s%> [thyself] as the eagle וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> Though בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> among כּֽוֹכָבִ֖ים <S%H3556><s%> among the stars שִׂ֣ים <S%H7760><s%> and though thou set קִנֶּ֑ךָ <S%H7064><s%> thy nest מִשָּׁ֥ם <S%H8033><s%> there אוֹרִֽידְךָ֖ <S%H3381><s%> thence will I bring thee down נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If גַּנָּבִ֤ים <S%H1590><s%> If thieves בָּאֽוּ־ <S%H935><s%> came לְךָ֙ אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If שׁ֣וֹדְדֵי <S%H7703><s%> to thee if robbers לַ֔יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> by night אֵ֣יךְ <S%H349><s%> how נִדְמֵ֔יתָה <S%H1820><s%> (how art thou cut off הֲל֥וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not יִגְנְב֖וּ <S%H1589><s%> ) would they not have stolen דַּיָּ֑ם <S%H1767><s%> had אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If בֹּֽצְרִים֙ <S%H1219><s%> gatherers בָּ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> came לָ֔ךְ הֲל֖וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not יַשְׁאִ֥ירוּ <S%H7604><s%> to thee would they not leave עֹלֵלֽוֹת׃ <S%H5955><s%> grapes

אֵ֚יךְ <S%H349><s%> how נֶחְפְּשׂ֣וּ <S%H2664><s%> searched out עֵשָׂ֔ו <S%H6215><s%> How are [the things] of Esau נִבְע֖וּ <S%H1158><s%> things sought up מַצְפֻּנָֽיו׃ <S%H4710><s%> [how] are his hidden

עַֽד־ <S%H5704><s%> forth הַגְּב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> thee [even] to the border שִׁלְּח֗וּךָ <S%H7971><s%> have brought כֹּ֚ל <S%H3605><s%> All אַנְשֵׁ֣י <S%H582><s%> All the men בְרִיתֶ֔ךָ <S%H1285><s%> of thy confederacy הִשִּׁיא֛וּךָ <S%H5377><s%> with thee have deceived יָכְל֥וּ <S%H3201><s%> thee [and] prevailed לְךָ֖ אַנְשֵׁ֣י <S%H582><s%> the men שְׁלֹמֶ֑ךָ <S%H7965><s%> that were at peace לַחְמְךָ֗ <S%H3899><s%> against thee [they that eat] thy bread יָשִׂ֤ימוּ <S%H7760><s%> have laid מָזוֹר֙ <S%H4204><s%> a wound תַּחְתֶּ֔יךָ <S%H8478><s%> Thahash אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> else תְּבוּנָ֖ה <S%H8394><s%> under thee [there is] none understanding בּֽוֹ׃

הֲל֛וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not בַּיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Shall I not in that day הַה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he נְאֻם <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וְהַאֲבַדְתִּ֤י <S%H6><s%> even destroy חֲכָמִים֙ <S%H2450><s%> the wise מֵֽאֱד֔וֹם <S%H123><s%> [men] out of Edom וּתְבוּנָ֖ה <S%H8394><s%> and understanding מֵהַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> out of the mount עֵשָֽׂו׃ <S%H6215><s%> Esau

וְחַתּ֥וּ <S%H2865><s%> shall be dismayed גִבּוֹרֶ֖יךָ <S%H1368><s%> And thy mighty תֵּימָ֑ן <S%H8487><s%> [men] O Teman לְמַ֧עַן <S%H4616><s%> because of יִכָּֽרֶת־ <S%H3772><s%> may be cut off אִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> to the end that every one מֵהַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> of the mount עֵשָׂ֖ו <S%H6215><s%> of Esau מִקָּֽטֶל׃ <S%H6993><s%> by slaughter

מֵחֲמַ֛ס <S%H2555><s%> For [thy] violence אָחִ֥יךָ <S%H251><s%> against thy brother יַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> Jacob תְּכַסְּךָ֣ <S%H3680><s%> shall cover בוּשָׁ֑ה <S%H955><s%> shame וְנִכְרַ֖תָּ <S%H3772><s%> thee and thou shalt be cut off לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> for ever

בְּיוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> In the day עֲמָֽדְךָ֣ <S%H5975><s%> that thou stoodest מִנֶּ֔גֶד <S%H5048><s%> On בְּי֛וֹם <S%H3117><s%> on the other side in the day שְׁב֥וֹת <S%H7617><s%> carried away captive זָרִ֖ים <S%H2114><s%> that the strangers חֵיל֑וֹ <S%H2428><s%> his forces וְנָכְרִ֞ים <S%H5237><s%> and foreigners בָּ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> entered [שַׁעֲרֹו כ] (שְׁעָרָ֗יו <S%H8179><s%> gate ק) וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> for יְרוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <S%H3389><s%> upon Jerusalem יַדּ֣וּ <S%H3032><s%> and cast גוֹרָ֔ל <S%H1486><s%> lots גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> again אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> you כְּאַחַ֥ד <S%H259><s%> even thou [wast] as one מֵהֶֽם׃ <S%H1992><s%> do

וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תֵּ֤רֶא <S%H7200><s%> But thou shouldest not have looked בְיוֹם־ <S%H3117><s%> on the day אָחִ֙יךָ֙ <S%H251><s%> of thy brother בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in the day נָכְר֔וֹ <S%H5237><s%> alien וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּשְׂמַ֥ח <S%H8055><s%> neither shouldest thou have rejoiced לִבְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> over the children יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in the day אָבְדָ֑ם <S%H6><s%> of their destruction וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תַּגְדֵּ֥ל <S%H1431><s%> proudly פִּ֖יךָ <S%H6310><s%> neither shouldest thou have spoken בְּי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in the day צָרָֽה׃ <S%H6869><s%> of distress

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תָּב֤וֹא <S%H935><s%> Thou shouldest not have entered בְשַֽׁעַר־ <S%H8179><s%> into the gate עַמִּי֙ <S%H5971><s%> of my people בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in the day אֵידָ֔ם <S%H343><s%> of their calamity אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תֵּ֧רֶא <S%H7200><s%> yea thou shouldest not have looked גַם־ <S%H1571><s%> Yes אַתָּ֛ה <S%H859><s%> you בְּרָעָת֖וֹ <S%H7451><s%> on their affliction בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in the day אֵיד֑וֹ <S%H343><s%> of their calamity וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּשְׁלַ֥חְנָה <S%H7971><s%> nor have laid בְחֵיל֖וֹ <S%H2428><s%> [hands] on their substance בְּי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in the day אֵידֽוֹ׃ <S%H343><s%> of their calamity

וְאַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> not תַּעֲמֹד֙ <S%H5975><s%> Neither shouldest thou have stood עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> at הַפֶּ֔רֶק <S%H6563><s%> in the crossway לְהַכְרִ֖ית <S%H3772><s%> to cut off אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פְּלִיטָ֑יו <S%H6412><s%> those of his that did escape וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תַּסְגֵּ֥ר <S%H5462><s%> neither shouldest thou have delivered up שְׂרִידָ֖יו <S%H8300><s%> those of his that did remain בְּי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in the day צָרָֽה׃ <S%H6869><s%> of distress

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for קָר֥וֹב <S%H7138><s%> [is] near יוֹם־ <S%H3117><s%> For the day יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַגּוֹיִ֑ם <S%H1471><s%> upon all the heathen כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> you עָשִׂ֙יתָ֙ <S%H6213><s%> as thou hast done יֵעָ֣שֶׂה <S%H6213><s%> it shall be done לָּ֔ךְ גְּמֻלְךָ֖ <S%H1576><s%> unto thee thy reward יָשׁ֥וּב <S%H7725><s%> shall return בְּרֹאשֶֽׁךָ׃ <S%H7218><s%> upon thine own head

כִּ֗י <S%H3588><s%> Because כַּֽאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> you שְׁתִיתֶם֙ <S%H8354><s%> For as ye have drunk עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and הַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> mountain קָדְשִׁ֔י <S%H6944><s%> upon my holy יִשְׁתּ֥וּ <S%H8354><s%> drink כָֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> All הַגּוֹיִ֖ם <S%H1471><s%> [so] shall all the heathen תָּמִ֑יד <S%H8548><s%> continually וְשָׁת֣וּ <S%H8354><s%> yea they shall drink וְלָע֔וּ <S%H3886><s%> and they shall swallow down וְהָי֖וּ <S%H1961><s%> and become כְּל֥וֹא <S%H3808><s%> and they shall be as though they had not הָיֽוּ׃ <S%H1961><s%> existed

וּבְהַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> But upon mount צִיּ֛וֹן <S%H6726><s%> Zion תִּהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> will be those פְלֵיטָ֖ה <S%H6413><s%> shall be deliverance וְהָ֣יָה <S%H1961><s%> become קֹ֑דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> and there shall be holiness וְיָֽרְשׁוּ֙ <S%H3423><s%> shall possess בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> and the house יַֽעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> מוֹרָֽשֵׁיהֶם׃ <S%H4180><s%> their possessions

וְהָיָה֩ <S%H1961><s%> Then בֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> And the house יַעֲקֹ֨ב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob אֵ֜שׁ <S%H784><s%> shall be a fire וּבֵ֧ית <S%H1004><s%> and the house יוֹסֵ֣ף <S%H3130><s%> of Joseph לֶהָבָ֗ה <S%H3852><s%> a flame וּבֵ֤ית <S%H1004><s%> and the house עֵשָׂו֙ <S%H6215><s%> of Esau לְקַ֔שׁ <S%H7179><s%> for stubble וְדָלְק֥וּ <S%H1814><s%> and they shall kindle בָהֶ֖ם וַאֲכָל֑וּם <S%H398><s%> in them and devour וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> will be no יִֽהְיֶ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> become שָׂרִיד֙ <S%H8300><s%> them and there shall not be [any] remaining לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house עֵשָׂ֔ו <S%H6215><s%> of Esau כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> For יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD דִּבֵּֽר׃ <S%H1696><s%> hath spoken

וְיָרְשׁ֨וּ <S%H3423><s%> shall possess הַנֶּ֜גֶב <S%H5045><s%> And [they of] the south אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> the mount עֵשָׂ֗ו <S%H6215><s%> of Esau וְהַשְּׁפֵלָה֙ <S%H8219><s%> and [they of] the plain אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> the Philistines וְיָרְשׁוּ֙ <S%H3423><s%> and they shall possess אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׂדֵ֣ה <S%H7704><s%> the fields אֶפְרַ֔יִם <S%H669><s%> of Ephraim וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> שְׂדֵ֣ה <S%H7704><s%> and the fields שֹׁמְר֑וֹן <S%H8111><s%> of Samaria וּבִנְיָמִ֖ן <S%H1144><s%> and Benjamin אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַגִּלְעָֽד׃ <S%H1568><s%> [shall possess] Gilead

וְגָלֻ֣ת <S%H1546><s%> And the captivity הַֽחֵל־ <S%H2426><s%> of this host הַ֠זֶּה <S%H2088><s%> of this לִבְנֵ֨י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֲשֶֽׁר־ <S%H834><s%> Who כְּנַעֲנִים֙ <S%H3669><s%> [shall possess] that of the Canaanites עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far צָ֣רְפַ֔ת <S%H6886><s%> [even] unto Zarephath וְגָלֻ֥ת <S%H1546><s%> and the captivity יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who בִּסְפָרַ֑ד <S%H5614><s%> which [is] in Sepharad יִֽרְשׁ֕וּ <S%H3423><s%> shall possess אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> עָרֵ֥י <S%H5892><s%> the cities הַנֶּֽגֶב׃ <S%H5045><s%> of the south

וְעָל֤וּ <S%H5927><s%> shall come up מֽוֹשִׁעִים֙ <S%H3467><s%> And saviours בְּהַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> on mount צִיּ֔וֹן <S%H6726><s%> Zion לִשְׁפֹּ֖ט <S%H8199><s%> to judge אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> the mount עֵשָׂ֑ו <S%H6215><s%> of Esau וְהָיְתָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become לַֽיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> shall be the LORD'S הַמְּלוּכָֽה׃ <S%H4410><s%> and the kingdom
